text: I mean, I love L.A. - I love living here. But I wish that we could make things without the need to hit a home run every single time. It's a unique thing to Hollywood that if you don't do that every time, then you're considered a failure. But it's like, 'Well, are you making movies to be successful? Or are you making movies to learn something?'
author: Kristen Stewart

text: It's not like I sit around watching my movies again and again, but I've never quite believed actors when they say they don't watch themselves.
author: Kristen Stewart

text: It's a funny thing: You want so badly for people to see what you do - you're proud of it - and I like the effect that movies have on people. But the attention can also make me uncomfortable.
author: Kristen Stewart

text: Very often when I go in to meet for movies or pilots, I'm put on videotape. I hate the notion that that tape is going to sit on a shelf and never get better.
author: David Ogden Stiers

text: I love movies that make me cry, because they're tapping into a real emotion in me, and I always think afterwards: how did they do that?
author: John Lasseter
